hotel.Name: Fairmont Heritage Place, Ghirardelli Square
hotel.Description: This family-friendly San Francisco hotel is located in the historical district, just steps from San Francisco Maritime National Historical Park and Ghirardelli Square. Lombard Street and Fisherman's Wharf are also within 15 minutes.
